name: Themailtoolbox
0:
”Alexa open the mail toolbox and set my sick reply”
”Alexa open the mail toolbox and set my out of the office reply”
”Alexa open the mail toolbox and set my sick email for tomorrow”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the mail toolbox
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Link your outlook account and set out of the office automated reply emails from a huge selection of templates. 

Save time! set your automated replies from bed.

Kindly see https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wIx20MOYWnQ for a video demonstration.
